data.name: Dice Of Olympus
data.detailed_description:
Dice of Olympus is a strategy game that uses customizable dice as game mechanics to defeat online players or monsters in a rich adventure mode. The game dive the player into the world of Greek myths and all its great epics. Play as the Olympians Gods, Ares, Athena, Artemis, Poseidon etc... in revisited adventures and in multi-player confrontations comparable to the titanomachy !

Gameplay

Choose your god with his unique spells, customize your 5 dice with more than 100 unique faces, playing with all the game mechanics to build an unfailing strategy. Put in your deck all the spells that you need to thwart your opponent's strategy and get you out of badest situations.

Once in combat, do everything in your power to get the best possible draws, don’t be too greedy, and choose wisely the dice you reroll and the spells you launch and their targets. Turn by turn, setup your plans and anticipate the best and worst scenarios to bring your opponent's health points down to zero. In Dice Of Olympus you can :

  • Attack the health points
  • Blocking dices of your opponent
  • Increase your roll to be sure to have what you want
  • Increase your favor to get unique bonuses
  • Invoke magic crystals and deal bonus or curses
  • Gain mana for launching bigger spells

Starting a combat

When you arrive in combat the game will propose you only 3 of the 5 dices that you customized, among the 3 dice, you will be able to change only one if you don't want to start the game with this, once the phase of Mulligan finished, the real combat can begin !

Roll phase

Each turn will start by the roll phase, it's in this phase that you will be able to select your dices and roll them if you desire. Don't forget that Dice Of Olympus doesn't contain a fog of war and you can look the dices of your opponent ! With that in mind, try to anticipate what will do your opponent to counter him.

Combat phase

Once you're ready you will be able to launch your spells to your opponent, to determine which player can play and which player had to wait we created a velocity system, each spell has a mana cost and a velocity value, when your velocity is smaller then your opponent you can launch spell until you overtake his velocity value.

The economy system

Each turn you will gain coins from your dice that will help you to unlock more dice on the battlefield or to gain power to grow your points of mana and launch more expensive spells ! So be smart in where you will put your coins.

Your control over random

The game is based on dice rolls, and therefore, is subject to randomness.
However, uncontrolled randomness can generate strong frustration and a feeling of injustice and helplessness among players.
To counter this aspect we decided that when you roll a dice, you are guaranteed to draw a different face then the previous one
With this little twist, you can create strategy based on Milling for exemple

Dice Building

The Temple is the place where you can customize your dice decks. Take your time to read the descriptions of the many faces at your disposal, and distribute them wisely among your dice to create synergies and really great combo.

Content

In Dice Of Olympus, you will be able to play 2 game modes. The adventure mode which will propose you to relive Greek myths revisited. A multiplayer mode in 1 against 1 to play against your friends or players from around the world with a ranking system.
